title: Spawn Rules
description: Data-Driven spawning allows you to adjust the spawn conditions of mobs.

format_version.title: Format Version
format_version.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

minecraft:spawn_rules.title: Spawn Rules
minecraft:spawn_rules.description: Data-Driven spawning allows you to adjust the spawn conditions of mobs.

description.title: Description
description.description: The descripton of to which entity this spawn rule belongs.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The entity identifier this spawn rule will apply to, entity must exist.

population_control.title: Population Control
population_control.description: Setting an entity to a pool it will spawn as long as that pool hasn't reached the spawn limit.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

F.title: Subject
F.description: The subject of this filter test.

D.title: Actor Health
D.description: Tests the health of the subject.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the health of the subject.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

G.title: All Slots Empty
G.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity is completely empty.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity is completely empty.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

I.title: Any Slots Empty
I.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity has any empty slot.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity has any empty slot.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

J.title: Bool Property
J.description: Returns true when the bool actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the bool actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BA.title: Clock Time
BA.description:
Compares the current time with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0).
0.0= Noon
0.25= Sunset
0.5= Midnight
0.75= Sunrise

test.title: Test Property
test.description:
Compares the current time with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0).
0.0= Noon
0.25= Sunset
0.5= Midnight
0.75= Sunrise

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BB.title: Distance To Nearest Player
BB.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

BC.title: Enum Property
BC.description: Returns true when the enum actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the enum actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BD.title: Float Property
BD.description: Returns true when the float actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the float actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BE.title: Has Ability
BE.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

BF.title: Has Biome Tag
BF.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

BG.title: Has Component
BG.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

value.description: (Required) The component name to look for.
value.title: Value

BH.title: Has Container Open
BH.description: Returns true when the subject Player entity has opened a container.

BI.title: Has Damage
BI.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type. has_damage can also use subject and operator parameters but they are optional.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type.

BJ.title: Has Equipment
BJ.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

CB.title: Has Equipment Tag
CB.description: Tests for the presence of an item with the named tag in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of an item with the named tag in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

CC.title: Has Damaged Equipment
CC.description: Tests for the presence of a damaged named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a damaged named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

CD.title: Has Mob Effect
CD.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

CF.title: Has Equipment
CF.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

CG.title: Has Property
CG.description: Tests for the presence of a property of the subject entity.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests for the presence of a property of the subject entity.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

value.title: Value
value.description: (Required) The property name to look for.

CH.title: Has Ranged Weapon
CH.description: Returns true when the subject entity is holding a ranged weapon like a bow or crossbow.

CI.title: Has Silk Touch
CI.description: Tests if the subject is holding an item with silk touch.

CJ.title: Has Tag
CJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

DA.title: Has Target
DA.description: Returns true if the subject entity has a valid target.

DB.title: Has Trade Supply
DB.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

DC.title: Home Distance
DC.description: Tests the distance between the subject and its home. Returns false if the subject has no home or if their home is in a different dimension.

DD.title: Hourly Clock Time
DD.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000].

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000].

value.description: (Required) An integer value set between 0 and 24000.
value.title: Value

DE.title: In Block
DE.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

DF.title: In Caravan
DF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

DG.title: In Clouds
DG.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

DH.title: In Contact With Water
DH.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

DI.title: In Lava
DI.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

DJ.title: In Nether
DJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Nether.

EA.title: In Overworld
EA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Overworld.

EB.title: In Water Or Rain
EB.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

EC.title: In Water
EC.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

ED.title: Inactivity Timer
ED.description: Tests if the specified duration in seconds of inactivity for despawning has been reached.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

EE.title: Int Property
EE.description: Returns true when the integer actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the integer actor property matches the value provided.

domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.

EF.title: Is Altitude
EF.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

EG.title: Is Avoiding Mobs
EG.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

EH.title: Is Biome
EH.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

EI.title: Is Block
EI.description: Returns true when the block has the given name.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

EJ.title: Is Bound To Creaking Heart
EJ.description: Tests that the Creaking Heart that spawned the subject Creaking still exists.

FA.title: Is Brightness
FA.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

value.description: The brightness value to compare with.
value.title: Value

FB.title: Is Climbing
FB.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

FC.title: Is Color
FC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

FD.title: Is Daytime
FD.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

FE.title: Is Difficulty
FE.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

value.description: The game's difficulty level to test.
value.title: Value

FF.title: Is Family
FF.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

FG.title: Is Game Rule
FG.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.

value.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.
value.title: Value

FH.title: Is Humid
FH.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity.

FI.title: Is Immobile
FI.description: Returns true if the subject entity is immobile. An entity is immobile if it lacks AI goals, has just changed dimensions or if it is a mob and has no health.

FJ.title: Is In Village
FJ.description: Tests whether the Subject is inside the bounds of a village.

GA.title: Is Leashed To
GA.description: Returns true if the subject entity leashed to the calling entity.

GB.title: Is Leashed
GB.description: Returns true if the subject entity is leashed.

GC.title: Is Mark Variant
GC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the mark variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

GD.title: In Nether
GD.description: Tests if the subject is not at full health.

GE.title: Is Moving
GE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is moving.

GF.title: Is Owner
GF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the owner of the calling entity.

GG.title: Is Persistent
GG.description: Tests if the subject's persistence matches the bool value passed in.

GH.title: Is Riding Self
GH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is riding the calling entity.

GI.title: Is Riding
GI.description: Returns true if the subject entity is riding on another entity.

GJ.title: Is Skin Id
GJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the skin id number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

HA.title: Is Sleeping
HA.description: Tests whether the Subject is sleeping.

HB.title: Is Sneak Held
HB.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the sneak input held.

HC.title: Is Sneaking
HC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sneaking.

HD.title: Is Snow Covered
HD.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with snow cover.

HE.title: Is Sitting
HE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sitting

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sitting.

HF.title: Is Target
HF.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the target of the calling entity.

HG.title: Is Target
HG.description: Tests whether the current temperature is a given type.

value.description: The Biome temperature catagory to test.
value.title: Value

HH.title: Is Temperature Value
HH.description: Tests the current temperature against a provided value in the range (0.0, 1.0) where 0.0f is the coldest temp and 1.0f is the hottest.

value.description: The Biome temperature value to compare with.
value.title: Value

HI.title: Is Underground
HI.description: Returns true when the subject entity is underground. An entity is considered underground if there are non-solid blocks above it.

HJ.title: Is Underwater
HJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity is under water. An entity is considered underwater if it is completely submerged in water blocks.

IA.title: Is Variant
IA.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

IB.title: Is Vehicle Family
IB.description: Returns true when the subject entity's vehicle is a member of the named family.

value.title: Value
value.description: The Family name to look for.

IC.title: Is Visible
IC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is visible.

ID.title: Is Waterlogged
ID.description: Tests if the subject block is submerged in water.

IE.title: Light Level
IE.description: Tests is the mob is outside of the specified light level range (0, 16).

IF.title: Moon Intensity
IF.description: Compares the current moon intensity with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0)

IG.title: Moon Phase
IG.description: Compares the current moon phase with an integer value in the range (0, 7).

IH.title: On Ground
IH.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on ground.

II.title: On Ladder
II.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on a ladder.

IJ.title: Random Chance
IJ.description: Returns true if the random chance rolls 0 out of a specified Maximum range.

JA.title: Rider Count
JA.description: Returns the number of riders on this entity.

JB.title: Surface Mob
JB.description: Tests if the subject is a surface mob.

JC.title: Taking Fire Damage
JC.description: Tests if the subject is taking fire damage. Requires the damage_sensor component

test.title: Test
test.description: Tests if the subject is taking fire damage. Requires the damage_sensor component

JD.title: Target Distance
JD.description: Tests the distance between the calling entity and its target.

JE.title: Owner Distance
JE.description: Tests the distance between the subject and its owner. Returns false if there is no owner.

JF.title: Trusts
JF.description: Returns true if the subject is trusted by entity.

JG.title: Weather At Position
JG.description: Tests the current weather, at the actor's position, against a provided weather value.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

JH.title: Weather
JH.description: Tests for the current weather state the entity is experiencing.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

JI.title: Y Rotation
JI.description: Returns the Y rotation of this entity.

B.title: Biome Filter
B.description: This component allows the players to specify which biomes the mob spawns in. Each biome in the game has one or more tags. These tags are used to determine what biomes mobs spawn in.

JJ.title: Brightness Filter
JJ.description: This component allows players to set the light level range that causes the mob to spawn.

min.description: This is the minimum light level value that allows the mob to spawn.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum light level value that allows the mob to spawn.
max.title: Max

adjust_for_weather.description: This determines if weather can affect the light level conditions that cause the mob to spawn (e.g. Allowing hostile mobs to spawn during the day when it rains.)
adjust_for_weather.title: Adjust For Weather

BAA.title: Delay Filter
BAA.description: This component allows players to set mobs spawn with certain time delays before they will spawn.

min.description: This is the minimum delay that a mob spawns.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum delay that a mob spawns.
max.title: Max

identifier.description: The identifier of the mob that will spawn.
identifier.title: Identifier

spawn_chance.title: Spawn Chance
spawn_chance.description: The percent chance that this entity will spawn.

BAB.title: Density Limit
BAB.description: This component allows the players to specify the amount of mobs to spawn in certain locations.

surface.description: This is the maximum number of mobs of this type spawnable on the surface.
surface.title: Surface

underground.description: This is the maximum number of mobs of this type spawnable underground.
underground.title: Underground

BAC.title: Difficulty Filter
BAC.description: This component allows players to set mobs spawn at certain difficulty levels. The min is for Peaceful difficulty and the max is for Hard difficulty.

min.description: This is the minimum difficulty level that a mob spawns.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum difficulty level that a mob spawns.
max.title: Max

BAD.title: Disallow Spawns In Bubble
BAD.description: Allows creators to keep entities from spawning in bubbles.

BAE.title: Distance Filter
BAE.description: This component allows players to set mobs spawn with certain distance levels.

min.description: This is the minimum distance level that a mob spawns.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum distance level that a mob spawns.
max.title: Max

BAF.title: Height Filter
BAF.description: This component allows players to set mobs spawn within certain heights of their map.

min.description: This is the minimum height level that a mob spawns.
min.title: Min

max.description: This is the maximum height level that a mob spawns.
max.title: Max

initial_event.title: Initial Event
initial_event.description: Runs an event on the first entities in a group.

initial_event_count.title: Initial Event Count
initial_event_count.description: The number of entities that "initial_event" should trigger on.

min_size.description: This is the minimum number of mobs that spawn in a herd.
min_size.title: Minimum Size

max_size.description: This is the maximum number of mobs that spawn in a herd.
max_size.title: Maximum Size

event.description: This is an event that can be triggered from spawning.
event.title: Event

event_skip_count.description: This is the number of mobs spawned before the specified event is triggered.
event_skip_count.title: Event Skip Count

BAG.title: Height Filter
BAG.description: This component allows players to determine the herd size of animals.

BAH.title: Mob Event Filter
BAH.description: This component allows players to spawn mobs on a particular event.

event.description: The event String in this JSON Object is used to filter the spawn rules of the mob type. Can be type minecraft:pillager_patrols_event, minecraft:wandering_trader_event, or minecraft:ender_dragon_event..
event.title: Event Filter

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The percentage of 100 of a type of mob that should spawn. If there are multiple weights, they must add up to 100.

entity_type.title: Entity Type
entity_type.description: The type of mob to spawn.

guaranteed_count.title: Guaranteed Count
guaranteed_count.description: Causes mobs to spawn with a guaranteed_count before mobs that do not have this spawn condition.

BAI.title: Permute Type
BAI.description: This component allows the players to specify the permutations of a mob that will spawn.

BAJ.title: Player In Village Filter
BAJ.description: This component lets players be filtered by whether they are in a village or not, using distance and the village border definitions.

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: This is the maximum mob_event level that an entity spawns.

village_border_tolerance.title: Village Border Tolerance
village_border_tolerance.description: This is the minimum mob_event level that an entity spawns.

BBA.title: Spawn Event
BBA.description: Event related to the spawning of an entity.

BBC.title: Spawns On Lava
BBC.description: This component determines if an entity spawns lava.

BBD.title: Spawns On Block Filter
BBD.description: This component allows an entity to spawn on a particular block. It includes a string or array of strings for the block they may spawn on.

BBE.title: Spawns On Block Prevented Filter
BBE.description: This component allows an entity to not spawn on a particular block. It includes a string or array of strings for the block they may not spawn on.

BBF.title: Spawns On Surface
BBF.description: This component allows the mob to spawn on the ground. Adding the component causes it to be true, removing it causes the mob to stop spawning on the surface.

BBG.title: Spawns Underground
BBG.description: This component allows an entity to spawn underground.

BBH.title: Spawns Underwater
BBH.description: This component allows the mob to spawn underwater. Adding the component causes it to be true, removing it causes the mob to stop spawning underwater.

BBI.title: Weight
BBI.description: This component allows players to set a priority for how often that mob should spawn. Mobs with lower weight values will have a lower chance to spawn than mobs with higher weight values.

default.description: This is the priority of the mob spawning out of 100.
default.title: Default

BBJ.title: World Age Filter
BBJ.description: This component allows players to set mobs spawn after a certain amount of time has passed within a world.

min.description: This is the minimum world_age_filter level that a mob spawns measured in seconds.
min.title: Min
